description.full: This game was classified by the community with the following category scores - Violence=0/3, Sex=0/3, Mature Content=0/3. Draw pictures on your own or together with friends over Xbox LIVE. The pencil, brush, bucket and many colors to choose from helps you create the picture you want.
description.short: Draw pictures on your own or together with friends over Xbox LIVE. The pencil, brush, bucket and many colors to choose from helps you create the picture you want.
